description:
Lucifer himself.
Surveillant of the pact between http://anidb.net/ch25712 [Ganossa Maximilian] and Nemesis; reports to the King of Nemesis.
In the manga part going beyond the TV series (the "final battle" that is only announced at the series` end), Ganossa betrays Nemesis, and Lucifer sides with the http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] to stop him.
name: Lucifer
